ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"), OR( ISBLANK(AccountId), /* Assuming Account Name is linked via AccountId */ ISBLANK( Estimated_Working_Days__c ), ISBLANK( Type_of_Service__c ), ISBLANK( Units_Number__c ), ISBLANK( Estimated_Start_Date__c ), ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Units__c, ""), ISPICKVAL( Type_of_Project__c , ""), ISBLANK( Type_of_Service__c ), ISBLANK( Estimated_Start_Date__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To Close Win an Opportunity the following Fields must be completed: (Account Name, Estimated Working Days, Type of Project, Units Number, Estimated Start Date, Type of Units, Type of Service, Estimated End Date)
